briefTitle: Effects of Ivabradine in Patients With Stable Coronary Artery Disease Without Clinical Heart Failure

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Evidence of coronary artery disease
* Sinus rhythm and resting heart rate equal or higher than 70 bpm

Exclusion Criteria:

* Unstable cardiovascular condition
* Known hypersensitivity to ivabradine or current treatment with marketed ivabradine

outcomeMeasures.title: Primary Composite Endpoint
outcomeMeasures.description: First event among cardiovascular death or non-fatal myocardial infarction

outcomeMeasures.title: Cardiovascular Mortality
outcomeMeasures.description: Component of the primary composite endpoint

outcomeMeasures.title: Coronary Mortality
outcomeMeasures.description: Coronary mortality including sudden death of unknown cause, death from myocardial infarction, death from heart failure, death from coronary artery procedure, presumed arrhythmic death

outcomeMeasures.title: Non-fatal Myocardial Infarction
outcomeMeasures.description: Component of the primary composite endpoint

outcomeMeasures.title: Secondary Composite Endpoint
outcomeMeasures.description: Fatal or non-fatal myocardial infarction, coronary revascularisation

outcomeMeasures.title: Secondary Composite Endpoint
outcomeMeasures.description: Fatal or non-fatal myocardial infarction, coronary revascularisation, unstable angina

outcomeMeasures.title: Secondary Composite Endpoint
outcomeMeasures.description: Cardiovascular death, non-fatal myocardial infarction, non-fatal stroke

outcomeMeasures.title: Secondary Composite Endpoint
outcomeMeasures.description: Non-fatal myocardial infarction, coronary revascularisation, unstable angina
